how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Rake Leave In Conditioning Styler (sold separately) on sopping wet hair with your fingers as a moisture base to prep for styling..-Make sure your hair remains sopping wet throughout the styling process by using a spray bottle filled with water..-Grab a quarter-size amount and melt the Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Gel in your hands to warm up the product..-Apply in small sections with your fingers for kinkier hair textures (for more defined kinks and coils) and larger sections for curlier textures..-For frizz-free results, re-wet each section as you work through your hair to spread the product evenly with your fingers, making sure each strand is coated..-Allow your hair to air dry or diffuse with a handheld dryer. .-Alternatively, sit under a hooded dryer on the low heat setting until 85 to 95 percent dry and then allow to air dry the rest of the way. .-This product can also be used for twist-outs, braid-outs, roller sets, and more.                                                                                                                                                    .-Tip: Do not use on dry or damp hair and do not mix with the Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Cream (sold separately) since the gel is cream based and may cause it to lose its hold.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-SWIRL a small amount of bareMinerals in the lid with the Flawless Application Face Brush until all the bareMinerals are tucked into the bristles..-TAP away excess. Buff around your face and then approach your forehead, cheeks, and nose. Buff, buff, buff until you are satisfied with the coverage..-*Remember less is more when applying bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation.

name: Original Mineral Veil Talc-Free Loose Setting Powder SPF 25
shades: Illuminating Mineral Veil completely sheer with luminous finish
about: What it is:.A weightless mineral setting powder that extends makeup wear while bluring and minimizing the appearance of fine lines and pores with no flashback...What it does:.In a range of shades and finishes, Mineral Veil® Setting Powder is our cult favorite setting powder, versatile enough for all skintones and skin types. The light-as-a-feather, super smooth formulas blend onto skin without smudging the makeup you’re already wearing. Sheer and never cakey, Mineral Veil® Setting Powder weightlessly blurs and minimizes the appearance of fine lines and pores, whether it is applied over makeup or onto beautifully bare skin...What it is formulated WITHOUT:.- Parabens.- Sulfates.- Phthalates..What else you need to know:.Original Mineral Veil® Finishing Powder gives skin a translucent, soft finish. Make the most of your makeup with Mineral Veil, a see-through but spectacular finale for any kind of complexion. It minimizes the look of fine lines, absorbing oils, and softens your complexion for an airbrushed finish...Tinted Mineral Veil Finishing Powder delivers a warm tint finish. All the soft translucence of the original Mineral Veil finishing powder with a touch of warm tint. The finishing powder infuses your skin with softness and light while gently absorbing oil and minimizing the appearance of lines and pores. It goes on completely sheer and is versatile enough for all skintones...Illuminating Mineral Veil Finishing Powder gives your skin a blurring, brightening finish. Completely sheer and versatile enough for all skintones, this complexion illuminator provides a soft glow and keeps skin looking photo-ready. Light-reflecting pearls impart a radiant, ethereal softness...Hydrating Mineral Veil Finishing Powder leaves a cooling, brightening finish. This hydrating finishing powder brightens skin with a sheer, peachy-soft luminosity. The unique water and rice lipid encapsulated formula delivers an immediate brightening boost with a cool feeling. Clinically proven to improve skin’s ability to retain moisture, it also minimizes the appearance of fine lines, pores, and shine, and keeps your complexion looking fresh.*..This product is formulated without talc...*Based on an independent clinical study....
ingredients: Zea Mays (Corn Starch), Corn Starch Modified, Zinc Stearate, Magnesium Stearate. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..Swirl, Tap, Buff® application:..Swirl a small amount of Mineral Veil® Setting Powder in the lid until it all disappears into the brush...-Tap away excess...-Buff onto the skin in a circular motion...-Apply a quick sweep across the t-zone, around the cheeks or all over the face—wherever you need Mineral Veil® to gently lock makeup in place, absorb excess oil, and help keep you looking fresh.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before applying, moisturize and prime skin based on skin type..-For light coverage, apply foundation in the center of the face and blend out with fingers, beauty sponge, or dense foundation brush..-For medium to full coverage, apply foundation in the center of the face and blend out with a dense foundation brush..-To build coverage, re-apply foundation in desired areas and blend...For textured skin:.-If applicable, apply stick directly on the face to spot-conceal any problem areas..-Apply product on a dense foundation brush and stipple into the skin, including spot-concealed areas. .-Repeat as needed to build coverage...-After applying, set foundation with your setting powder/spray of choice.

Available in six unique shades, the pigments are buildable to your liking—from sheer to bold—and the formula is lightweight on the skin.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Rub your finger in a circular motion to warm up the formula..-Once creamy, dot the product that’s on your finger on both cheeks..-Blend the formula out by tapping it into the skin using your finger or brush..-To increase the pigment, repeat steps two and three..-Too much pigment? Diffuse the color by tapping a beauty sponge over the blush...Pro Tip:.-For textured skin, apply blush after setting your foundation.

name: GloPRO® FACE MicroTip™ Attachment Head
about: What it is:  An attachment head that is designed to target the look of fine lines on the face, neck, décolleté, and back of hands to help restore skin's glow...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, Pores..What Else You Need to Know:  The FACE attachment head helps smooth and firm the look of skin on the chin, cheeks, nose-to-mouth lines, forehead, eleven lines, neck, and décolleté. It also helps exfoliate, tighten the look of enlarged pores, and refine areas of uneven texture. It should be used up to and around the brow bone...Clinical Results: In a GloPRO® consumer perception survey:.- 97% felt the firmness of skin improved.- 97% agreed skin looked younger after using the GloPRO®
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use GloPRO® FACE in the PM after cleansing and prepping target area with a clarifying Prep Pad (sold separately). .-Glide GloPRO® in horizontal, vertical, and diagonal directions four to 10 times in each target area (about 60 seconds for entire face) to maximize skin invigoration. .-No need to apply additional pressure, just let the weight of the tool work its magic. .-Immediately apply your favorite skincare after using GloPRO® to boost product absorption.

name: Bright Eyes Restorative Colloidal Silver Depuffing & Brightening Eye Gels
about: What it is:A pair of eye masks that de-puffs and brightens the look of eyes while diminishing the appearance of fine lines..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Circles, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Puffiness.Formulation:Lightweight Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is  cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:These masks are formulated with pure colloidal silver which helps nurture skin to give the look of up to 10 hours of rest. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-To apply, use Blinc Mascara Amplifed on clean and dry lashes...-Brush on until you have achieved the desired degree of lash separation, volume, and length...-You can build on additional volume by applying as many coats as you wish...-For removal, neither water or pressure alone will remove Blinc Mascara Amplifed. Only the combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure from your fingertips, a washcloth, or water pressure (i.e. shower) will slide the tiny tubes off your lashes effortlessly...-Upon removal, you will actually see tiny tubes in your hand!

name: Lash Extension Tubing Mascara
about: What it is:A tubing mascara that builds the appearance of striking length and extreme definition with lash benefits..Formulation Type:Volumizing, Curling, Lengthening.Benefits:Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Biotin: Helps prevent hair loss by supporting the structure of eyelashes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The buildable formula creates ultra-long-wearing, striking length and extreme definition for a lash extensions effect. Infused with biotin, shea butter, and castor seed oil, it provides nourishment for your lashes. Its 1KTech-molded brush has QuickApply bristles for effortless application.
ingredients: -Biotin: Helps prevent hair loss by supporting the structure of eyelashes..-Castor Seed Oil: Moisturizes eyelashes by creating a barrier that prevents water loss..-Shea Butter: Nourishes eyelashes while adding creaminess to the formula...Water/Aqua, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, PVP, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Laureth-21, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Biotin, May Contain/Peut Contenir(+/-): Iron Oxides CI 77499.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.To apply:.-Use on clean, dry lashes..-Start at the base of your lashes and move upward to the tips..-Wiggle the wand slightly from side to side while applying..-Keep applying until you have achieved your desired lift, definition, length, and volume..-Clean the tube opening of any residual mascara to ensure that the cap closes tightly...To remove:.-Water alone (sweat or tears), gentle pressure alone (rubbing your eyes or sleeping in your mascara), and makeup removers cannot remove the tiny mascara tubes..-Only the combination of water and gentle pressure (from your fingertips, a cotton round, or your showerhead) will slide the tiny tubes easily off your lashes..-Keep applying lots of water until the tubes begin to slide off effortlessly. Do not pull on your lashes otherwise..-Don’t worry; those tiny mascara tubes you see in your hand, cotton round, or shower are not your lashes—that’s the beauty of tubing technology.

name: Original Tubing Mascara
about: What it is:.What it does:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Water/Aqua, Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Laureth-21, Caprylyl Glycol, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Carbonate, May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77499)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Use Blinc Mascara on clean and dry lashes..-Within two minutes, apply one or more coats. Keep applying coats until the desired lash volume, length, and separation is achieved before Kiss Me Mascara sets...-Once set, additional coats cannot be applied...-Neither water alone nor pressure alone will remove Blinc Mascara..-Only the combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure, from your fingertips, a wash cloth, or water pressure will slide the tiny tubes effortlessly off your lashes...-No need to pull your lashes. Just keep soaking them with warm water until the tubes slide off (like a glove coming off of a hand)...-Upon removal you will actually see the tiny tubes in your hand. Don't worry, those are not your lashes falling out..... Precautions:..-If eye becomes irritated in any way, discontinue use and consult a physician immediately...-Do not use a makeup remover. Water and gentle pressure is all it takes for removal.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On day one, apply to damp hair, rake through, and style. .-On day two (and so on), apply to dry hair to refresh and restyle...Pro tips:.-Mist from mid-lengths to ends, working through your hair by squeezing it in. Air-dry for natural styles or blow-dry with a round or flat brush for smooth, straight styles. .-Some areas of the hair may be more (or less) porous than others. Take some time massaging into hair after spraying to help absorb evenly..-When detangling, try using a wide tooth comb. It’s a great way to help prevent breakage.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, pop the flip-top and apply to damp hair..-Leave on for three to five minutes..-Rinse..-Use weekly..-For fine to medium hair, apply a quarter-size amount from mid-shafts to ends..-For medium to coarse/thick hair, apply a palm-size amount from roots to ends. Use enough to saturate the hair..-To use as a pre-poo, apply to dry hair, leave on for five minutes, then rinse..-For a richer consistency, add a few drops of Hairdresser‘s Invisible Oil (sold separately) to the mask..-Leave on for up to 20 minutes for extra-dry hair.

name: Her Eau de Parfum
shades: 1 oz/ 30 mL  , 1.6 oz/ 50 mL eau de parfum spray, 3.3 oz/ 100 mL
size: 1.6 oz/ 50 mL eau de parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Fruity Floral..Key Notes: Blackcurrant, Jasmine Accord, White Woods, Musk, Dry Amber..Fragrance Description: A fruity gourmand scent opening with a trio of dark and red berries lightened by white woody accord. A blend of jasmine and violet unfurl, illuminated by a bright accord of white woods. Amber and musk envelop this long lasting scent, further elevating the fusion of floral and fruity facets...About the Bottle: A creation by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian, this Burberry fragrance represents dynamic women with a zest for life and love of stepping into the unknown. Effortlessly chic, the understated bottle is topped with a light pink cap, echoing the luminosity of the feminine scent within...About the Fragrance: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum is an artful blend of berries elevated by spirited jasmine and violet, and smoothed out with amber and musk. A fruity floral creation bringing together berries, jasmine and violet, grounded by an ambery and musky base. A multi-faceted, long lasting fruity gourmand scent.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Bht, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly..-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent..-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum
shades: 1 oz / 30 ml eau de parfum spray, 1.6 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray, 3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray
size: 3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Vanilla Infusion, Vanilla Caviar, Vanilla Absolute.Fragrance Description:This unique gourmand fragrance is made with a vegan formula led by a powerful trio of vanillas. On top, a vanilla infusion with woody tonalities, at the heart a vanilla caviar with a rich sweetness, and at the base a vanilla absolute enriched with luminous lavender..About the Bottle:Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is encased in an elegant, square-shaped bottle designed to be refilled (refill sold separately). Pale pink packaging adorned with a gold medallion reference the brand’s rich heritage..About the Fragrance:The power within. Burberry Goddess tells a story of self-discovery. The new campaign follows Emma Mackey and a pride of lionesses. Radiating confidence, strength and kindness, Emma embodies the spirit of Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Propylene Glycol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Coumarin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Alcohol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Anise Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray the Burberry Goddess perfume generously onto pulse points such as the neck, wrists, and décolletage to increase the longevity of this refined Burberry scent..-Gently press onto the skin to preserve the essence of the fragrance. ...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense....Refill Instructions:.Thanks to a sustainable and innovative refill system, all Burberry Goddess bottles can be refilled with ease..|Remove the bottle cap, then unscrew the fragrance pump, and screw the refill onto the bottle’s neck. |The refill will stop automatically once the perfume bottle is filled. |Unscrew the refill, screw the fragrance pump back onto the bottle and replace the cap. |Your refilled Burberry Goddess fragrance is now ready to be used.

name: Rosie Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sheer..Key Notes: Rose, Nude Musk, Vanilla..Fragrance Description: ROSIE is all white musk. It’s the top, middle and base note but we added just a hint of pure ROSE oil to ground and open up the senses. This fragrance will mold itself to you- making it unique to ONLY you. Rosie leaves skin smelling of clean and calm...About the Fragrance: Inspired by naked skin with notes of nude musk and sweet rose..FEELS LIKE: Sleeping in your birthday suit. Nude + translucent..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Organic Cane Sugar Alcohol And Distilled Water, Ambrettolide, Ambroxan, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylene Brassylate......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent....We work hard, so you don’t have too!  ALL by Rosie Jane packaging is recyclable..How to be a cool human:.- Remove pump and sprayer from our bottles, rinse and throw into your home recycle bin..- Our boxes too!!.- You can return the sprayer and pumps back to By Rosie Jane and we will recycle them for you and also give you a little gift in return....Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:.The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

shades: Out of stock: Dawn fair with pink undertones (cool), Pale Sun light with yellow undertones (warm), Golden Hour light with golden undertones (warm), Warm Sunglow medium with peach undertones (warm), Cool Sunrise medium with cool undertones (cool), Glowy Rays tan with golden undertones (warm), Out of stock: Daybreak tan with cool undertones (cool), Sunset deep with peach undertones (warm)
about: What it is: A clean, long-lasting, lightweight serum-like color corrector that quickly brightens and hydrates under-eyes to conceal dark circles without caking or creasing...Coverage: Light.Finish: Radiant.Formulation: Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients: - Color-Correcting Pigments: Neutralize and conceal dark circles and redness..- Peptides and Three Hyaluronic Acids: Provide smooth, lightweight hydration..- Functionalized Creamy Pearls: Create fast radiance without the shimmer...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. The light-to-medium buildable formula smooths and hydrates with peptides and hyaluronic acid and is applied with a flexible paddle..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Color-Correcting Pigments: Neutralize and conceal dark circles and redness. .-Peptides and Three Hyaluronic Acids: Provide smooth, lightweight hydration..-Functionalized Creamy Pearls: Create fast radiance without the shimmer. ..Water (Aqua, Eau), Caprylyl Methicone, Isododecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Glycerin, PEG-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propylene Carbonate, Caffeine, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, +/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the flexible mini paddle for ideal product placement..-Apply three dots from the inner corner to the middle of the under-eye to neutralize dark circles or redness..- For a lifted effect, apply two dots to the outer under eye using the same shade or one of the lifting shades..-Blend into skin with a concealer brush using a stippling motion or tap in with fingers....-There's no need to set the product because the formula is long-lasting and creaseless..-For a lifted effect, use the shade Dawn, Cool Sunrise, Glowy Rays, or Daybreak on the outer under-eye....Color Correcting Guide:.-Determine your undertone: Are you cool/pink, neutral/peach, or warm/golden?.-Cool/pink undertones choose from: Dawn, Cool Sunrise, or Daybreak..-Neutral/peach undertones choose from: Warm Sunglow or Sunset..-Golden/warm undertones choose from: Pale Sun, Golden Hour, or Glowy Rays....Recycling Instructions:.-Recycle the FSC-certified post-consumer recycled paper carton curbside..-Use a fork to remove wiper..-Clean out the remaining corrector formula from the 100 percent glass vial and the 60 percent PCR cap with warm water and dish soap..-Take the clean bottle and recycle at your local Sephora Pact Collective bin or mail to Pact Collective on caliraybeauty.com..-Go to this link to start process: https://bit.ly/3FrL5H6

name: Good Girl Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Tuberose, Jasmine, Tonka Bean..Fragrance Description: Black and white… good girl, bad girl. GOOD GIRL is a sensual, evocative fragrance born of the beautiful contradictions and the ever-present duality of modern women and modern life. Both freshly light and moodily dark, this innovative fragrance captures a woman’s wondrous complexity with surprising and exceptional ingredients. The sweet, alluring qualities of jasmine give GOOD GIRL its brightness and femininity. The darker side is created with richly fragrant cocoa and intoxicating tonka. Almond and coffee bring the scent its immediate vibrancy. Tuberose, extracted in a new way that creates a rich delicacy, is the fragrance’s wild card, bringing fluidity and femininity. GOOD GIRL exemplifies the effortless elegance and wit of the House of Herrera...The ground-breaking bottle, the first in the form of a high heel, speaks as eloquently of the power of modern femininity and a woman’s dual nature as the fragrance itself. Made of sleek, smoky, midnight blue glass, it stands on the tallest, thinnest gold heel...Give a girl the right shoe and she can conquer the world.—Carolina Herrera de Báez, Brand Founder
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Saliclate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonen, Geraniol, Citronellol, Isoeugenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2) Alcohol Of Vegatal Origin 80%.

about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Mandarin, Ylang-Ylang, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:A fresh, floral explosion of femininity, this radiant reinvention of the iconic Good Girl scent reveals the multifaceted nature of modern womanhood with a double dose of sensual vanilla and exotic ylang-ylang..About the Bottle:This fragrance is housed in a delicate pastel-pink stiletto..About the Fragrance:Inspired by powdery blush, this 100 percent vegan perfume contrasts the sensuality of two different vanilla extracts with the romanticism of a peony heart note. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Chloe L'Eau de Parfum Intense
shades: 3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray, 1 oz / 30 ml eau de parfum spray, 1.6 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray
size: 3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Classic Florals.Key Notes:Raspberry, Rose, Ambery Woods.Fragrance Description:Indulge in a symphony of roses with Chloé L'Eau de Parfum Intense for women. Like a breath of fresh air in early spring, it captures the essence of budding roses, vibrant and rejuvenating.  As the women’s fragrance unfolds, the aromas of fully bloomed and honeyed roses start to reveal themselves, lending a scent that is reminiscent of moments filled with joy..About the Bottle:Radiating pure femininity, the Chloé Eau de Parfum bottle captivates with its updated pleated silhouette that now features a more contemporary design. Forged from clear glass that allows for the amber hue of the fragrance to shine through, it is adorned with a black and ecru label and is embraced by a burgundy-colored ribbon that nods to the key ingredient the fragrance is built around: the rose..About the Fragrance:An undeniably feminine fragrance spray, Chloé L'Eau de Parfum Intense is a delicate floral scent with notes of rose warmed by hints of amber and woody cashmeran.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Alcohol, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Geraniol, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Red 4 (Ci 14700), Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To ensure you receive lots of compliments and so that this gorgeous fragrance stays with you all day, spray the Chloé perfume onto your body’s pulse points, including the wrists, behind the ears, the neck, and the décolletage..-Keep your Chloé fragrance out of direct sunlight to prolong its beautiful aromas. .-To help protect our planet and cut down on waste, use the 5 oz Eau de Parfum refill (sold separately) to refill your Eau de Parfum for women once it has run out.

name: L'Eau de Parfum Lumineuse Eau de Parfum
shades: 1.6 oz eau de parfum spray, 3.3 oz eau de parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Jasmin Sambac, Organic Rose Essence, Vanilla & Patchouli.Fragrance Description:This irresistible Chloé l'Eau de Parfum Lumineuse builds around a luminous rose, stitched with vanilla to intensify the scent’s floral heart with balsamic and amber hints. Lent a hint of warmth by the sweetness of Madagascan vanilla, the rose further reveals its floral splendor and complexity, while velvet-like jasmine sambac lends a solar quality to this exuberant gourmand and floral bouquet. Free-spirited, feminine, and sensual, this eau de parfum for women will attract compliments every time you wear it..About the Bottle:The pleated glass bottle is crowned with a glowing silver metal cap, while the luminous beige outer box is finished with silver accents. Around the bottle’s neck is a hand-tied beige ribbon stitched with delicate pink thread. Usually reserved for garments, this emblematic and distinctive Chloé stitching is presented on a perfume bottle for the very first time. The bottle is made with 25 percent recycled glass, and the ribbon contains 100 percent recycled polyester..About the Fragrance:Chloé l'Eau de Parfum Lumineuse is vegan and formulated with natural origin fragrance, alcohol, and water, nothing else.*
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Makeup Brush Cleaner
about: What it is:.What it does:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Isoparaffin Hydrocarbon, Hydrotreated Heavy Naptha, Isopropylparaben, Isobutylparaben, N-Butylparaben, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla Bean) Fruit Extract and D&C Green #6.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Pour CS Makeup Brush Cleaner into a shallow dish, enough to dip one quarter of the way up the brush bristles.  ..-Dip brush tip into liquid and remove immediately, the capillary action will draw liquid up into bristles.  ..-Wipe clean on absorbent paper towel or cloth, repeat as necessary. Shape brushes and allow to air dry completely before use.  .....2 oz Travel-size:..-Ideal for cleaning brushes on the go. Hold spray bottle one to two inches from brush bristles...-Rotate while spraying to reach all sides...-Wipe clean on absorbent paper towel or cloth, repeat as necessary...-Allow makeup brushes to dry completely before use...... Precautions:..-Highly flammable. Keep away from open flame.  ..-Do not swallow. If swallowed, do not induce vomiting and seek medical attention...-Avoid contact with skin and eyes.  ..-Keep out of reach of children.

name: Professional Makeup Brush Cleaner - Lemon
about: What it is: A professional-grade, liquid makeup brush cleaner that is quick drying, rinse-free, and clear...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Taking it off is as important as putting it on. Keeping makeup brushes immaculate and free of residue when traveling, between takes, backstage, or on tour is a professional’s most important step to a perfect makeup application—and practicing the best hygiene is a crucial part in any professional artist’s career. This professional-quality brush cleaner is a makeup industry cult-favorite that can be used on both natural and synthetic fibers, and it doesn’t leave an oily residue. It cleans, conditions, and deodorizes brushes in one step. It’s coveted by makeup artists for its incomparable cleansing ability, quick drying time, and pleasant lemon scent.
ingredients: Ethanol, Hydrotreated Heavy Naptha, Lemon Scent
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pour CS Makeup Brush Cleaner into a shallow dish, enough to dip one quarter of the way up the brush bristles..-Dip brush tip into liquid and remove immediately, the capillary action will draw liquid up into bristles..-Wipe clean on absorbent paper towel or cloth, repeat as necessary. Shape brushes and allow to air dry completely before use....Precautions:.-Highly flammable. Keep away from open flame..-Do not swallow. If swallowed, do not induce vomiting and seek medical attention..-Avoid contact with skin and eyes..-Keep out of reach of children.

name: Reserve - Skin Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Fresh Musk, Copaiba Oil, Salted Praline.Fragrance Description:This is the signature scent you've been looking for. Creamy Madagascar vanilla offers a soft and subtle sweetness to the cozy, close-to-the-skin musk, creating the perfect everyday perfume. Wear this scent alone or layer with other CLEAN RESERVE perfumes to add warmth with a kiss of sweetness..About the Bottle:CLEAN RESERVE cares about the health of the planet. Working with vendors who use green manufacturing processes and minimizing the amount of waste produced by the packaging is of paramount importance. The cap is made of sustainable wood from Spain. The corn-derived cellophane is biodegradable and compostable..About the Fragrance:Crafted with the people and planet in mind. Always cruelty-free, vegan, gluten-free and phthalate-free. Skin is crafted with sustainable vanilla from Madagascar to support programs for reforestation, drinking water wells and medical facilities for the farming communities.
ingredients: Ingredients/Ingrédients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance*, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxycitronellal,.Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Linalool.*Fragrance Ingredients Greater Than 0.09%: Ethylene Brassylate, Ethyl Linalool,.Dimethylcyclohexylethoxy Isobutylpropanoate, Tetrahydro-Methyl-Methylpropyl)-Pyran-4-ol,.Methyldihydrojasmonate, Dipropylene Glycol
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Cold Milk, Mahogany Wood, and Marshmallow..Fragrance Description: Seeking comfort in the familiar, this creamy and calming scent offers the perfect start to the day. The similar look reflects that Commodity’s original formulations are now housed within the Expressive Scent Space, and that these middle ground perfumes are the perfect balance of plus and minus...About the Fragrance: I was inspired by the memory of a family vacation in the fall, when we spent hours around fires, telling stories and making s’mores. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz one to two times directly on the pulse points, such as your wrists, inner elbows, or sides of the neck. .-Pulse points are warmer areas of the body that act as natural diffusers when emitting a scent..-After application, allow the scent to air dry. .-Rubbing or dabbing will break down a fragrance and cause it to wear off more quickly..-If you wear fragrance on the wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing..-Properly store your bottle to extend its shelf life, including recapping after each use and avoiding direct sunlight... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense...Recycling Instructions: .-While Commodity works toward fully recyclable packaging, most of your fragrance can currently be recycled. .-Box, paper notecard, and pulp tray should be recycled as paper. .-Glass bottle and metal pump should be recycled as glass. .-Cellophane and bottle cap should be thrown in the trash.

Rubbing or dabbing will break down a fragrance and cause it to wear off more quickly. .- If you wear fragrance on the wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing. .- Properly store your bottle to extend its shelf life, including recapping after each use and avoiding direct sunlight.

about: What it is:A talc-free, refillable dry shampoo powder with a kabuki brush for targeted application that leaves scalp and strands clean and refreshed..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Oily Scalp.Key Benefits:- Absorbs oils and cleanses scalp.Highlighted Ingredients:- Persimmon-Derived Tannic Acid: Deodorizes and leaves hair smelling as clean as wash day..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Crown Affair’s Dry Shampoo is a silky and entirely talc-free powder formula. Persimmon-derived tannic acid refreshes and deodorizes while tsubaki seed oil prevents dryness and irritation, leaving hair cleansed with subtle volume—without the grit of traditional aerosol products. The packaging is refillable and comes with an insert that can be removed..Fragrance Description:Crown Affair’s signature fragrance combines bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass for a cool, light scent.
ingredients: -Persimmon-Derived Tannic Acid: Deodorizes and leaves hair smelling as clean as wash day..-Tsubaki Seed Oil: Prevents dryness and irritation at the scalp..-Tapioca Starch: Absorbs oils and enriches your scalp without talc....Tapioca Starch, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Cetrimonium Chloride, Trehalose, Saccharomyces, Persimmon Fruit Juice Ferment Extract, Sodium Bicarbonate, Fragrance (Parfum), Camellia Japonica (Tsubaki) Seed oil, Isodecylneopentanoate, Dimethicone, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, Linalool....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dip brush into powder lightly..-Apply directly to roots where needed..-Use pads of fingers to further distribute product..-Repeat as necessary until desired look and feel is achieved...To insert the refill: .-Remove your old refill by twisting to the right to release..-Recycle. .-Insert the new refill into the base of the jar..-Twist to the left until it clicks into place. .-Refill is sold separately.

name: The Mini Leave-In Conditioner Cream for Hydrated Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is: A weightless, yet ultra-hydrating, leave-in conditioner cream for fine, dry, or damaged strands that defines texture and reduces frizz...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture:  Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Heat Protection.- Dryness.- Curl-Enhancing..Key Benefits:.- Smooths, softens, adds shine.- Hydrates and protects from heat.- Defines natural texture and prevents frizz..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This is the ultimate leave-in conditioner and subtle styling cream hybrid. It’s a versatile, buildable formula that hydrates damp hair post-shower, and refreshes dry hair between washes. It reduces frizz and flyaways by smoothing strands and adds definition to your hair’s texture—without heaviness or stickiness. Its hydrating properties help restore dry or damaged hair to its natural state while also protecting from future damage...Fragrance Description: Crown Affair’s signature fragrance combines bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass for a cool, light scent....Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study of 38 women over 3 weeks:.-99% said their hair felt hydrated but not weighed down.-99% said their hair felt softer.-97% said their hair felt less frizzy.-98% said their hair looked more vibrant and had enhanced shine..
ingredients: -Tsubaki Seed Oil: Deeply moisturizes, adds shine, and strengthens strands without weight...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the pump applicator, dispense around 1-2 pumps for finer strands, and 3-4 for thicker strands—it’s buildable, so start small and add more as needed..-Use on damp hair to lock-in hydration post-shower and for a consistent, even air dry with defined texture.-Use on dry hair between wash days for a hydration refresh, to subtly style waves or curls, and to smooth strands and reduce frizz or flyaways

name: OI Conditioner for Softness and Shine
about: What it is:A softening conditioner that gives hair extraordinary body and shine while accelerating the drying process and protecting against heat damage..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Hydrates and protects hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Roucou Oil: Protects and strengthens hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This conditioner is infused with roucou oil, apricot butter, and a cellulose conditioning agent. ingredients: -Vitamin E: Nourishes and protects skin from damage. .-Rice Bran: Gently exfoliates. .-Rosemary: Protects skin from damage. ..Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Extract, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense into dry hands..-Massage over dry face and eyes to dissolve surface oil, SPF, makeup, and debris. .-Concentrate on areas of congestion or stubborn debris..-Wet hands and continue massaging to create a light, milky emulsion..-Rinse with lukewarm water and follow with any Dermalogica cleanser (sold separately).

name: Mini Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator
about: What it is:A gentle, rice-based powder exfoliant that visibly brightens, improves the look of skin‘s texture, and clears pores..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Powder.Highlighted Ingredients:- Licorice, Grapefruit, and Phytic Acid from Rice Bran: Visibly even skin tone, leaving your skin looking glowing and smooth..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This gentle powder exfoliates, leaving the skin looking smoother and brighter. The formula activates upon contact with water, foaming into a creamy paste and releasing papain, salicylic acid, and rice actives. It reduces the appearance of wrinkles, uneven skin tone, and hyper-pigmentation while a soothing blend of green tea and colloidal oatmeal calms the look of redness.
ingredients: -Papain Enzymes and Salicylic Acid: Draw out excess oil, clear clogged pores, and smooth the look of skin..-Rice Bran-Derived Phytic Acid: Gently exfoliates to visibly brighten and balance uneven skin tone..-Colloidal Oatmeal: Calms skin, reducing the appearance of redness and irritation....Microcrystalline Cellulose, Magnesium Oxide, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Colloidal Oatmeal, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Allantoin, Papain, Salicylic Acid, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, PCA, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Isethionate, Lauryl Methacrylate/Glycol Dimethacrylate Copolymer, Maltodextrin, Melaleuca, Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch Hydroxyethyl Ether, Water/Aqua/Eau, Limonene, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wet hands and face..-Dispense about a half teaspoon into wet hands, add a little water, and lather until you feel the powder completely dissolve into a smooth, foamy paste..-Apply to the face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area..-Massage gently for one minute, then rinse thoroughly with warm water..-Tip: Combine with Special Cleansing Gel (sold separately) to create a foam-like lather so you can cleanse and exfoliate in one step. .-Leave on skin for an extra minute for extra brightening benefits.

name: The One Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm and Sweet Gourmand.Key Notes:Amber, Jasmine, Peach, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Sensuous and timeless, The One Eau de Parfum is the essence of the DOLCE&GABBANA woman. This floral fragrance combines contemporary fruit ingredients with the perfumer‘s classic palette of white flowers. The scent opens with sparkling bergamot and mandarin blended with notes of lychee and peach. Heart notes of Madonna lily express a voluptuous intensity and enveloping femininity followed by the seductive dry-down of vanilla, amber, and musk.
ingredients: Alcohol, Fragrance, Water, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Bht, Ci 15985 (Yellow 6), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

about: What it is:A new, dual-phase serum with the Super Anti-Aging Serum in Phase One and a ceramide-peptide complex to visibly diminish signs of aging and promote skin longevity in Phase Two..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:- Triple Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates intensely, retains moisture, and provides a rapid, visible plumping effect..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This serum works at a molecular level to prevent and target visible changes to the skin associated with biological aging, including fine lines and wrinkles, loss of elasticity, uneven skin tone and texture, dehydrated skin, and dullness. Skin looks and feels firmer, younger, and healthier.
ingredients: -Triple Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates intensely, retains moisture, and provides a rapid, visible plumping effect. .-Biomimetic Polypeptides: Shown in in-vitro studies to support collagen and elastin within as few as seven days. .-Skin Identical Ceramides: Boost skin barrier function for a smoother, more refined appearance. ..Aqua/Water/Eau, Dibutyl Adipate, Butylene Glycol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Pentylene Glycol, Squalane, Glycerin, Polygonum Bistorta Root Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetyl Palmitate, Lactobacillus/Portulaca Oleracea Ferment Extract, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Triethyl Citrate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Baicalin, Caprylyl Glycol, Glutathione, Ceramide EOP, Oligopeptide-1, Propanediol, Disodium Cetearyl Sulfosuccinate, Sucrose Distearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Xanthan Gum, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Sclerotium Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Hexylene Glycol, Behenic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Pantolactone, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate.

name: Super Anti-Aging Serum
about: What it is:A powerful serum with active antioxidants that nurture the skin while visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This serum contains extracts of purslane and skullcap that support the skin's rejuvenating qualities. name: Mini Cicapair Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30
about: What it is: A bestselling green-to-beige SPF cream that rapidly neutralizes visible redness, evens the appearance of skin tone, and has a natural-looking finish...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Redness..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Mineral Sunscreen (Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide): Forms a protective barrier that reflects UV rays, shielding skin from sun damage...What Else You Need to Know: For centuries, tigers in the Asian wetlands have rolled around in Centella asiatica (AKA tiger grass or cica) to help heal their wounds. Taking inspiration from the tigers, this K-Beauty fave utilizes visibly reparative tiger grass to soothe, calm, and moisturize skin.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply to clean, moisturized skin..-Warm a dime-size amount between your hands, then gently press and blend into your skin. The cream will transform from green to beige as you blend, evening out your skin tone..-Apply more as needed.-Use alone as a color corrector for a natural-makeup look..-For more coverage, use as a primer and follow with your favorite foundation..Beauty Tips:-Build up for extra coverage in concern areas..-If you have drier skin, use a richer moisturizer before applying.

name: B-Hydra™ Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A daily flood of hydration, this hydrating serum replenishes skin while improving long-term hydration, diminishing dullness, dryness, and the look of fine lines...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Lightweight Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Pineapple Ceramide: Boosts luminosity and improves the appearance of skin‘s texture and tone..- Provitamin B5: As a humectant, it attracts hydration to the skin and holds it there, visibly improving skin‘s barrier function..- Sodium Hyaluronate: With a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid, it is able to penetrate skin and deliver intense hydration to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote visible firmness...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with pro-vitamin B5 and pineapple ceramide, B-Hydra provides immediate hydration while improving skin’s water-retention abilities, promoting long-lasting hydration and revealing a more luminous and youthful-looking complexion. With a skin-friendly pH of 5.7, B-Hydra is ideal for all skin...This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance...Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state...Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free...Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 29 people after 8 weeks:.-97% agreed skin felt smoother.-93% agreed skin felt more hydrated.-93% agreed skin looked more radiant...
ingredients: -Pineapple Ceramide: Boosts luminosity and improves the appearance of skin’s texture and tone..-Provitamin B5: As a humectant, it attracts hydration to the skin and holds it there, visibly improving skin’s barrier function..-Sodium Hyaluronate: With a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid, it is able to penetrate skin and deliver intense hydration to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote visible firmness...Water, Coconut Alkanes, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Wheat Amino Acids, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Berberis Vulgaris Root Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Niacinamide, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyproline, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply one pump to a clean, dry face, neck, chest, hands, or any place needing increased hydration. Mix with any Drunk Elephant serum, oil, or cream to lock it in. .-TIP: Exfoliate regularly to ensure maximum absorption of the product. .-Skincare Smoothie Tip: At night, try a Drunk Elephant Good to Glow Smoothie by mixing 1 pump T.L.C. Framboos + 1 pump B-Hydra + 2-3 drops of A-Gloei in the palm of your hand and applying it all over for smoother, hydrated and glowing skin.

name: The Half Shot Small Round Blow Dryer Brush
about: What it is:A round blow-dryer brush that combines the hot air of a blow-dryer with the structure of a small round brush to create defined curls and waves and a shiny blowout in one easy step..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Shine.Key Benefits:- Creates defined waves and curls.What Else You Need to Know:Three temperature and speed settings, maximum airflow, and ergonomic design make blow-drying a breeze for all hair types. Ionic Technology reduces frizz and adds shine. Nylon and tufted bristles grip hair to detangle and smooth, while the round barrel adds defined curls and waves. This tool is perfect for detailed styling.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water..-Brush out hair using a detangling brush or comb..-Separate into large sections..-Place The Half Shot underneath each section..-Work it gradually from roots to ends, until the section is dry and smooth..-For defined curls and waves, use vertically throughout the hair..-For volume at the roots, use horizontally at the crown..-The Half Shot can also be used on dry hair to create a smooth, finished look.

name: The Smooth Shot Paddle Brush Blow-Dryer
about: What it is:A blow-dryer with the structure of a paddle brush to create a smooth blowout with added body in one quick, simple step..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Creates smooth, straight blowouts.What Else You Need to Know:Great for detangling and creating a smooth, luminous blowout, this brush uses ionic technology to seal the cuticle for less frizz and tons of shine. Strategically placed vents allow for maximum airflow, while the broad, flat base ensures a faster drying time. The combination of long-length nylon and tufted bristles creates the perfect amount of tension for easy detangling and styling.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water. .-Brush out hair with a detangling brush or comb, then separate into large sections. .-Glide The Smooth Shot Paddle Brush Blow-Dryer through each section, working it slowly from roots to ends until hair is dry and smooth..-For added shape/bend, brush from beneath the section and angle brush in desired direction.

name: The Tress Press Digital Styling Iron
categories: Hair, Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is:.A styling iron to straighten, wave, or curl all hair types while smoothing and adding shine...Key benefits:.- Straightens and curls.- Smooths.- Adds shine..If you want to know more….The Tress Press features ionic technology and titanium plates for smooth, shiny, quick curls/waves or straight styles. Floating plates provide constant contact with the hair to straighten in one pass, while the rounded edges allow you to wrap hair around the barrel for curls and waves. It features digital temperature control, 60-minute automatic shut-off, and a professional length nine-foot cord...What else you need to know:.This product is guaranteed with a two-year limited warranty.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Work in one- to two-inch (two to five cm) cleanly parted, brushed sections..-To straighten: hold iron horizontally. Clamp hair at the root and slowly pull through to the ends, slightly beveling toward the face to prevent static..-To curl: hold iron vertically. Clamp hair midway through the section, then twist the iron away from your face 180 degrees and pull forward through to the ends..-The slower you pull, the greater the curl. For waves, pull through more quickly.

name: High Tops Self-Grip Rollers
about: What it is:.A set of six self-grip rollers to provide mega-lift just where you want it...Key benefits:.- Stay in place without tugging/pulling.- Includes two sizes for any length hair.- Creates volume at the crown..If you want to know more….These rollers roll easily into hair and stay in place without clips or clamps, then remove gently without pulling or tugging strands. The result is effortless lift just where you want it—at the crown of the head. The secret is the gentle self-grip material that provides strong hold while preventing pulling or damage to hair.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Create a three-inch section at the crown of the head and comb through so it is smooth and free of tangles..-Starting from the ends, roll the hair toward the base of the section, away from the face..-Leave in for 10 to 15 minutes. For best results, use rollers when hair is still warm from a blowout..-Remove the rollers and tousle hair to break up shape.

name: Chitosan Pre-Styling Hair Cream for Flexible Hold
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
shades: Straight to Wavy Hair, Light Conditioning, Straight to Wavy Hair, Rich Conditioning, Curly to Coily Hair, Light Conditioning, Curly to Coily Hair, Rich Conditioning
size: Color: Straight to Wavy Hair, Light Conditioning
about: What it is: A pre-styling cream that harnesses Dyson’s Triodetic™ technology to flexibly lock in heat-styled hair and create touchable, long-lasting hold with a lightweight, natural feel. Available in four formulas, each precisely blended with ingredients to deliver the best results for your specific hair type...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Hold & Style Extending.- Shine..Key Benefits: - Provides 2X longer hold.¹ Without the crunch..- Up to 50% less frizz.¹.- Conditions the hair surface...Highlighted Ingredients:- Chitosan: Locks in flexible hold..- Argan Oil: Reduces frizz..- Grapeseed Oil: Seals in shine...*Dyson uses chitosan derived from oyster mushrooms, not shellfish in our styling range. Mushroom-derived chitosan offers a sustainable and non-allergenic solution for our active ingredient...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan...What Else You Need to Know: Conventional retention products create a glue-like bond between strands, leaving hair feeling crunchy. In response, Dyson has developed a lightweight retention product that conditions each individual hair while locking in your style...These formulas transform from cream to a sheer serum in the hand, for even application. Select a formula based on your hair type and texture. - Light Conditioning for Straight to Wavy Hair, best suited for hair that is easily weighed down - Rich Conditioning for Straight to Wavy Hair, best suited for hair that needs more intensely nourishing ingredients - Light Conditioning for Curly to Coily Hair, best suited for hair that is easily weighed down - Rich Conditioning for Curly to Coily Hair, best suited for hair that needs more intensely nourishing ingredients..Blends of botanical oils are tailored to each hair type (grapeseed oil for light conditioning and argan and castor oil for rich conditioning) in a formula that conditions the hair’s surface, reducing frizz and protecting natural shine. Chitosan, an ingredient derived from oyster mushrooms, allows each strand to move, flex, and recall its style in unison with the rest. Each bottle contains the equivalent of four to five oyster mushrooms’ worth of chitosan...Caveats:.¹vs. untreated hair..*Dyson uses chitosan derived from oyster mushrooms, not shellfish in our styling range. Mushroom-derived chitosan offers a sustainable and non-allergenic solution for our active ingredient...Fragrance Description: A unique and subtle blend of green and floral notes, Dyson’s signature fragrance unfolds with bergamot, basil, and tangerine.
ingredients: -Chitosan: Locks in flexible hold..-Argan Oil: Reduces frizz..-Grapeseed Oil: Seals in shine...Aqua (Water/ Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, C13-15 Alkane, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Chitosan, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-100 Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone, C12-14 sec-Pareth-5, C12-14 sec-Pareth-9, Polyquaternium-37, Lactic Acid, Behentrimonium Chloride, Acrylates Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Parfum (Fragrance), Tetrasodium EDTA, Decylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Isopropyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA,Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Citral, Citronellol, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use on towel-dried hair before drying and styling..-Pump to dispense product..-Start with 2-5 pumps and add more as needed..-Sheer between palms..-Smooth onto mid-lengths and ends..-Style hair as desired with your favorite Dyson hair tool (sold separately)..-For best results, use with Dyson’s Chitosan Post-Styling Hair Serum for Hold & Style Extending (sold separately) for maximum retention....Select your formula according to your hair type and texture:.-Light Conditioning for Straight to Wavy Hair and Light Conditioning for Curly to Coily Hair are best suited for hair that’s easily weighed down..-Rich Conditioning for Straight to Wavy Hair and Rich Conditioning for Curly to Coily Hair are best suited for hair that needs more intensely nourishing ingredients....Recycling Instructions:.-Inner cartridge and refill cartridge are recyclable. Remove pump and/or cap and ensure container is fully clean before recycling.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-This one-stick-wonder is your magic multitasker. ..Prime:.-Prep your skin with FF Fabulous Serum (sold separately) to create a poreless effect and effortless glide. ..All-over coverage:.-For sheer to medium coverage, swipe once or dab onto the skin, and gently use your fingertips to pat and blend outward. .-For medium to full coverage, swipe two to three times onto the skin and blend foundation using your favorite complexion brush. .-Set with FF Set It Loose Powder (sold separately) for a translucent, oil-free finish. .-Set with FF Iconic Pressed Powder (sold separately) for a more full-coverage finish and long-lasting wear. ..Contour: .-Choose a shade two to three times darker than your skin tone, depending on the depth of contour you prefer. .-Swipe onto areas where you want to add depth, warmth, and dimension: below your cheekbones, along your jawline, along the hairline and sides of your forehead, and along the sides of your nose. . .Highlighter:.-Select a shade one to two times lighter than your skin tone and tap onto the high points of the face and areas you want to brighten, like the cheekbones, eyelids, tip of the nose, and Cupid’s bow...Conceal and touch up:.-Using your fingertip or a small concealer brush, gently dab and tap the product under the eyes and areas you want to even or ease discoloration.

Sunburn Alert: This product contains Glycolic and Lactic Acids that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards....To Refill 60 Day Facial Radiance Jar :.1. about: What it is:A customizable tool that lifts away visible dirt, oil, and makeup residue on skin and offers firming facial massages..What Else You Need to Know:This tool features manual cleansing and massage controls with customization in the FOREO app. The brush head has thin touchpoints for a gentle cleanse, with broader touchpoints for precision, and can be further personalized by cleansing intensity and massage routines..Clinical Results:Participants in a 28-day consumer trial reported the following benefits:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To unlock LUNA 4, pair with the FOREO For You app. .-Once paired and settings decided, device can be used without the app..-Remove all makeup, dampen skin, and apply your favorite cleanser..-Press the universal button to turn on the LUNA 4..-Choose between Gentle, Regular, or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device..-Cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose..-Press and hold the button for three seconds to turn off device..-Rinse and pat your face dry. .-Apply other skincare products..-Access firming massage manually or follow the instructions on the FOREO app to activate the firming massage function.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Dry styling: .-Spritz ghd Bodyguard Heat Protect Spray over hair (sold separately)..-Part hair into one-inch-wide sections..-For a sleek, straight look: Place styler at the root and glide down the section. Use a brush for added tension and smoothness..-For a wavy or curly look: Place Styler at the root, rotate 180 degrees, and glide down the section. .-Repeat through hair...For wet to dry styling: .-Start with the ghd Helios hair dryer (sold separately). The included nozzle provides precision drying for continued styling. .-Mist over ghd Shiny Ever After shine spray (sold separately) for a smooth and sleek finish.

name: Duet Style 2-in-1 Hot Air Styler
categories: Hair, Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is: A 2-in-1 hot-air styler that transforms hair from wet to styled for smooth hair with no damage.*..Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Frizz.- Shine.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits:.- Dry and style at the same time with no damage.- Unprecedented softness for up to 48 hours**.- Protects hair’s natural moisture..What Else You Need to Know: Transform hair from wet to styled without compromising hair health. Duet Style respects your hair's natural moisture*** and dries with no damage,* sizzling, or burning smell. Once hair is dry, turn on Shine Shot™ mode to straighten your hair at the optimal temperature of 365°F. For all hair types..*No thermal hair damage detected after 4 passes in wet to style mode vs naturally dried hair..**Consumer testing, 142 women, June 2021..***vs. naturally dried hair, dependent on consumer use..Research Results:.- No hair damage*.- Up to 48 hours of unprecedented softness**.- 2x more shine***.- Protects hair's natural moisture***.*No thermal hair damage detected after 4 passes in wet to style mode vs naturally dried hair.**Consumer testing, 142 women, June 2021.***vs naturally dried hair, dependent on consumer use..
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Remove excess water and ensure your hair is towel dried before use..-Slide the power button upwards to turn ON your Duet Style. After a few seconds you will hear the fan ramp up as it heats up to the optimal low styling temperature for wet hair. Once the light stops flashing and the product beeps, it is ready to use..-Divide your hair into 2-inch manageable sections, no larger than the width of the plates. .-Take a section of hair and place Duet Style close to the roots, pausing for three seconds. .-Glide down the hair toward the ends in a slow and steady pace. Repeat until dry and move on to the next section of hair, starting once again from the roots..-Once all your hair is completely dried, for an optional boost of shine, activate Shine Shot™ by pressing down the Shine Shot™ button for 4 seconds until you hear a beep (Shine Shot™ should only be used on dry hair.) The fan will stop and the plate temperature will increase to the optimal ghd styling temperature of 365°F. Once the product beeps and the lights stop flashing, Shine Shot™ is ready. Your Duet Style can now be used as a regular flat iron. .-If you wish to return from Shine Shot™ back to wet-to-style mode, press and hold the Shine Shot™ button for 2 seconds. Your tool will beep as the plates cool down and the fan will start. The ‘ready to use’ tone will play when it is safe to use on wet hair.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-This powder can be used alone to even out the complexion, as a setting powder to lock in foundation, or as the last step in your routine to finish your makeup look..-IApply lightly with the puff provided for an even and precise application or with a brush for an all-over perfected look....For Puff Application:.-Twist off the cap and hold the puff over the opening..-Shake the powder twice..-Stamp the powder on the cheekbones, sides of nose, forehead, and chin..-Diffuse the powder by blending out with the puff to create an even, flawless complexion..-Repeat as needed for desired result....For Brush Application:.-Dispense a small amount of powder onto the lid..-SSwirl a large fluffy brush into the product..-Tap off excess product..- Lightly buff into skin...-Repeat as needed for desired result.

Wash and dry hands..-Gently push back cuticles using the cuticle stick and sanitize nails with alcohol pads..-Size Glamnetic nails by placing on finger and select sizes best suited for your natural nails..-Apply an even layer of glue to natural nails and the back of Glamnetic nails..-Align Glamnetic nails with cuticle line and apply at a downward angle. name: Lash Extension Kit
size: Color: Natural Kit (Xoxo + Virgo)ONLY A FEW LEFT
about: What it is:A set of two lash-extension clusters that last up to five days when applied with Glamnetic’s strong-hold bond for the most lightweight, enhanced lash look..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Tired of applying a new lash for every occasion? Glamnetic is changing the game with its top-selling lashes—now with at-home extensions that are easy to apply. This kit has all the tools you need to enhance your natural lashes for up to five days of wear per lash..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Bond:.Acrylates Copolymer, Water (Aqua/Eau), Tocopherol, Iron Oxides (CI 77499)...Seal:.Water (Aqua/Eau), Polyvinyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol...Bond Remover: .Water (Aqua/Eau), Propylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, PEG-6, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep your natural lashes by removing makeup/excess oils to maximize wear time. .-Curl your natural lashes with a lash curler, then brush on a thin, even coat of bond under your natural lashes (a little goes a long way). .-Brush only in one direction, so lashes don’t stick to each other (near root to midpoint of lash). .-For thinner lashes, apply two coats. .-For thick lashes, apply one coat. .-Wait 20 to 30 seconds for the bond to become tacky..-Using the lash grab, gently apply each cluster underneath the base of your natural lashes, slightly away from your waterline to avoid possible irritation..-Once you’re satisfied with your application, use the lash grab to merge both the band and the strands of each segment with your natural lashes..-To remove any residue, apply a thin coat of seal above and below lashes and wherever you feel excess stickiness....How to remove:.-Apply bond remover to a cotton ball..-Place pad over your eyes and hold for 20 seconds. .-Gently wipe off lash clusters and bond..-Repeat, if necessary, to ensure all residue is removed....Precautions:.-Do not use it if the eye is injured, infected, or irritated. .-Consult a physician promptly if damage occurs. .-Do not get bond or seal into eyes; in the event of direct contact, rinse with cool water. .-Keep out of reach of children.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply GrandeLASH™ using a single stroke on your eyelid just above your upper lash line (like a liquid eyeliner)..-Use once daily and allow 1-2 minutes for the serum to dry...Tips:.-Remember, you’re applying to the skin closest to the lashes (the lash root), not the actual lashes..-You don’t need multiple applications or double dips. Using more than instructed will not yield quicker results. One dip into the bottle is enough for both eyes..-Due to the length of the lash cycle, apply every day for a full three months..-After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeLASH™ requires continued use to maintain benefits...Precautions:.-Do not get into the eyes; in the event of direct contact, rinse with cool water. .-If you are under a physician’s care for an eye condition, are prone to dry eyes or are pregnant or nursing, consult your physician before use. .-Stop use if redness or irritation occurs. .-Keep out of reach of children.
