about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Vanilla Duo, Vanilla Orchid, Marine Ozonic Accord.Fragrance Description:Gucci’s first floral-gourmand fragrance, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum for women is a vanilla lover’s dream. It blends an enchanting contrast of sweet, warm vanilla balanced with marine ozonic accord, which adds an unexpected freshness to the vanilla to create an intoxicating scent. The result is a sensual and long-lasting fragrance that’s creamy, uplifting, and perfect for any occasion..About the Bottle:The Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is housed inside a yellow glass bottle and crowned with a luminous gold cap. Reimagined with the iconic Gucci Flora print both on the bottle and outer packing, the design is bursting with illustrated floral life..About the Fragrance:A signature scent for all occasions, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid invites you to weave your dreams into reality.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Cinnamal, Isoeugenol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

about: Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Warm Woods..Key Notes: Neroli, Freesia, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Best described as a floral vanilla perfume, Queens + Monsters features key notes of neroli, freesia, and sandalwood for a warm, unexpected and gourmand composition...About the Bottle: Henry Rose crafted their bottles to be genderless, modern, and minimal. Their 50ml bottles are made from 90% recycled glass,  caps are made from fully compostable soy resin, and cartons are made from biodegradable FSC hemp paper...About the Fragrance:  “The idea was to create a concentrated woody fragrance that still showed a very fluid and multifaceted identity. It is a game of contrasts between brightness and sensuality, a dialog between the sparkling, zesty freshness of the petitgrain and the creamy, milky facet of the sandalwood.” - Pascal Gaurin perfumer..All Henry Rose fragrances are EWG Verified, Cradle to Cradle Certified, and Leaping Bunny Certified Cruelty-Free...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Fruity Florals.Key Notes:Blackcurrant Bud, Blackberry, Sensual Musk,.Fragrance Description:Succulent blackcurrant buds and juicy blackberry, blood orange, and nectarine are wrapped with sensual musks and mineral woods that delight and entice the senses. Alcohol-free, water-based formula..About the Bottle:These body sprays feature a neutral-colored aluminum can. Aluminum is a lightweight material that is easier and more energy efficient to recycle than glass and convenient to bring anywhere..About the Fragrance:I wanted to play with the juicy, succulence of blackberry and elevate its innate sensuality. I blended blackberry and musk for a blackberry-musk-infused effect, and then used mineral woods, like driftwood and cedar, for contrast and textured sensuality.—Pascal Gaurin, Perfumer

about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Earthy Green & Herbs.Key Notes:Green Grass, Vetiver, Patchouli.Fragrance Description:The Dark Is Night Eau de Parfum blends the woodiness of patchouli with the richness of vanilla bean for a decadent finish..About the Bottle:Henry Rose craft their bottles to be genderless, modern, and minimal. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. name: House of Lashes® Eyelash Adhesive
about: What it is: A latex-free adhesive formulated for long-lasting wear...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, and phthalates...What Else You Need to Know: This lash adhesive is formulated for long-lasting wear. This product is safe to use for those with sensitive eyes and it is not tested on animals.
ingredients: Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acrylate Copolymer, Methylacrylate-Acid, Vitamin E, Aqua (Water, Eau)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Coat the false eyelash band with lash glue..-Allow it to sit for 40 or more seconds..-Wait for the glue to become tacky before applying the false eyelash for better adhesion. ...Tips and Tricks: .-Clean false eyelashes after three to four wears. .-Use your favorite makeup remover and a Q-tip to gently swab the false eyelashes and band. -Gently remove any excess lash glue with tweezers or your fingers. ...Caution: .-Use only as directed. .-Apply the glue only to the false eyelashes band..-Apply the lash band to your eyelid above your lash line. .-Do not apply the glue or lash band directly to your natural eyelashes.

name: Cruelty-Free Faux Mink Volumizing False Eyelashes
shades: Natalia full volume, criss-cross rounded shape, 3d eye-opening glam effect, stacked lashes add a multidimensional and striking lash look, Marigold dramatic volume, rounded shape, 4d ultra glam effect, multilayered lashes will add an eye-opening touch and create length defying lashes, Madison full volume, flared shape, 3d sultry glam effect, multilayered lashes provide ample volume to your eyes, Iris natural volume, wispy flared shape, 3d cat-eye effect, provide extra length and volume at the outer corners to elongate your eyes
about: No match
ingredients: Cruelty-Free Faux Mink Fibers.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For Beginners: .-Measure the false eyelash band against your lash line and trim the band with scissors if needed..-Gently bend the band into a 'U' shape to help it conform to your eye shape..-Gently curl your natural lashes..-Apply mascara to create a base..-Coat the false eyelash band with lash glue..-Allow it to sit for 40 or more seconds. .-Major Tip: Wait for the glue to become tacky before applying the lashes for better adhesion. -Use a lash applicator or tweezers to carefully place the false eyelash onto the center of your upper lash line. .-Adjust the inner and outer corners of the false eyelash. .-For a more seamless look, gently pinch the lash band and your natural lash line together to secure the application. ...Tips and Tricks: .-Apply mascara prior to applying false eyelashes. This helps blend your lashes together and prevents product buildup to extend the life of your false eyelashes. .-For a more seamless look, gently pinch the lash band and your natural lashes together. .-Clean false eyelashes after three to four wears. .-Use your favorite makeup remover and a Q-tip to gently swab the false eyelashes and band. .-Gently remove any excess lash glue with tweezers or your fingers..-Store false eyelashes in their original tray to preserve their shape and keep them clean. ...Caution: .-Use only as directed. .-Apply the glue only to the false eyelash band and apply the lash band to your eyelid above your lash line. .-Do not apply the glue or lash band directly to your natural eyelashes.

about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Citrus & Woods.Key Notes:Red Apple, Red Thyme, Red Leather.Fragrance Description:This captivating scent opens with vibrant, bold notes of red grapefruit and lime with a blend of velvety red apple accord and cinnamon that invigorate the senses. Red thyme and geranium drive aromatic energy at the heart with a deep, enveloping base of red leather accord, patchouli, and cedarwood..About the Bottle:The Hugo Intense flask arrives in statement-making red, complete with a concrete-effect finish and bold black logo and sealed with a striking black cap and red fabric strap to level up the intensity even further. This is red for energy, red for creativity, red for self-expression. This is Hugo Intense. Discover the full range of HUGO fragrances: Man, Jeans, Intense..About the Fragrance:Every beat. Every rhythm. Every note. Experience it all with Hugo Intense Eau de Parfum for Men, a dynamic fragrance to match your intensity. This captivating Fougere leathery scent keeps you present and unleashes new levels of creativity whenever you wear it.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Limonene, Coumarin, Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Citral, Eugenol, Cinnamal, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Red 33 (Ci 17200), Blue 1 (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140).

name: Boss Bottled Elixir
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Incense Essence, Vetiver Essence, Cedarwood Essence.Fragrance Description:Find your inner light with Hugo Boss Bottled Elixir, an elevated interpretation of modern masculinity. This confident, highly concentrated, ambery, woody fragrance for men features warm incense top notes, an enticing vetiver heart, and a base of cedarwood essence..About the Fragrance:Launched 25 years after Boss Bottled, Boss Bottled Elixir sees a fragrance icon reinterpreted with a vigorous statement, promising an immersive wearing experience. Crafted by the legendary perfumer Annick Menardo, this irresistible fragrance celebrates the reinvention of a contemporary classic.

name: BOSS The Scent Elixir Parfum Intense for Him
shades: Out of stock: 1.7 oz parfum spray, Out of stock: 3.4 oz parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Woody Spices..Key Notes: Pimento, Lavandin absolute, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Inflame the senses with BOSS The Scent Elixir for Him. This highly concentrated ambery leathery scent exudes allure with a blend of red-hot Pimento, carnal Caledonian sandalwood, and vibrant lavandin absolute for a signature scent that instantly captivates...About the Bottle: The iconic BOSS The Scent bottle is dressed in the same deep-red lacquered glass as its feminine counterpart, reflecting the intensity of the seductive scent within. The bottle is topped with a warm-gold cap featuring a luxurious satin finish, mirroring the gleaming metallic accents on the outer packaging...About the Fragrance: This ambery leathery elixir opens with a burst of red-hot Pimento, which conjures a complex, spicy scent full of charisma. At the heart, a lively Lavandin absolute with a vibrant energy. This sophisticated scent composition is enriched with a mellow, woody base of rich Caledonian sandalwood.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Cinnamal, Eugenol, Citral, Geraniol, Isoeugenol, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent....Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:.The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Lit and Luminous Baked Highlighter

name: Limitless Lash Lengthening Clean Mascara
about: What it is: An award-winning clean mascara that lengthens, lifts, and separates—now with more planet-friendly packaging...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Arginine (Keratin): Haircare hero that helps fortify and reinforce lashes from within..- Organic Shea Butter: Weightlessly conditions and adds a soft, flexible feel..- Beeswax: Helps seal in moisture for nourished, healthy-looking lashes...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclosa, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide the shorter side of the dual-sided wand through lashes to lift and define..-Use the longer, comb-like side to lengthen and separate each lash..-Apply more coats for a bolder look..-For extra lift and curl, use an eyelash curler before applying..-To remove, rinse with warm water—no makeup remover needed....Recycling Instructions:.-Clean inside and out with soap and hot water. A straw brush or clean mascara wand can  help..-Cut off the wand with scissors and discard..-Remove the bottom label and the inner ring from the opening of the tube and discard.

name: Self Tanning Drops
shades: 1.01 oz / 30 mL (Light), 1.01 oz / 30 mL (Medium), 1.01 oz / 30 mL (Dark)
about: Which skin type is it good for?.✔ Normal.✔ Oily.✔ Combination.✔ Dry.✔ Sensitive.What it is:.A bottle of custom-made self-tanning drops that allow you to control your glow..Solutions for:.- Uneven skin tone.- Dryness.- Dullness and uneven texture.If you want to know more….Married to your moisturizer but want that super-tanned glow, too? Simply add these color-correcting Self Tanning Drops to your moisturizer for a natural, sunkissed glow with no streaks, smells, or orange tones. Isle of Paradise has combined a color corrective approach with a tanning-know-how to bring you your best glow ever—whether that's for the beach or brunch. All drops combine organic tanning actives with avocado, chia seed, and coconut oils for a happy, hydrated glow..The peach drops are formulated with Oxy Glow™ complex, which is clinically proven to brighten your skin, the green drops are formulated with Super Balance™ complex to reduce redness, calm the skin, and improve your karma, and the violet drops are formulated with Hyper Violet™ complex to reduce orange/sallow tones and raise your tanning game..What else you need to know:..What else you need to know:.Isle of Paradise’s products are made with color-correcting technologies to help even out skin tone for the most real looking, natural tan ever. This product is cruelty-free, 100 percent vegan, organic, and made using certified organic ingredients, actives at low pH levels, non-sensitizing ingredients, hypoallergenic ingredients, and pure oils. It does not contain mineral oils, petrolatum, gluten, GMO, or toxins..For a light tan: choose peach..For a medium tan: choose green..For a dark tan: choose violet...

name: Gaultier Divine Le Parfum
shades: 1.7 oz / 50 ml parfum spray, 1 oz / 30 ml parfum spray, 3.4 oz / 100 mL parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Fresh Florals..Key Notes: Calypsone (salty note), Frangipani Accord, Benzoin..Fragrance Description: Reveal your divine aura with Gaultier Divine Le Parfum, the best intense amber floral women’s perfume by Jean Paul Gaultier. With a mist of this warm fall scent, spectacular lily and radiant frangipani meet with an aquatic salty kiss that embraces an airy gourmand of vanilla meringue...About the Bottle: Gaultier Divine Le Parfum honors their golden and radiant solar divinity in its iconic conical corset. Under a blazing sun, the famous corset scintillates with an unrivalled golden glow, irresistibly more intense and charismatic. The uninhibited curves and conical bust encased in flamboyant gold-ribbed metal celebrate a solar femininity with an untamed spirit...About the Fragrance: This intensely divine amber-floral fragrance invites you to be your divine and sensual self with this eau de parfum that's even more intense and daring than the original. Spectacular lily and radiant frangipani bestow their dazzling solar energy. Gaultier Divine's salty kiss embraces the warm opulence of benzoin, and the airy, gourmand indulgence of an irresistible meringue. You'll be crowned with an all-new addiction that's as seductive as it is radiant.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Alcohol, Eugenol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 42090 (Blue 1), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

Gaultier's famous corset is much more than an item of lingerie, it is a precious jewel that honors women’s bodies and showcases their diversity: covered in gold, conical, and already iconic.

about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Juicy Rose, Black Cherry Liquor, Moss Accord.Fragrance Description:I Want Choo Forever is a chypre amber gourmand fragrance with notes of juicy rose, black cherry liquor, and moss accord. This eau de parfum encapsulates a sense of confidence and elegance unlike any other. The I Want Choo Forever Woman is fearless, seductive, and a bit unexpected..About the Bottle:The modern bottle design is shaped to reflect a feminine silhouette embellished with a jewel-like JC monogram on an elegant black, degrade lacquer color. The bottle is topped with a gold spray cap with a hammered effect, echoing the craftsmanship of the brand. The intense, sparkling, black and gold glitter box packaging reveals the precious JC monogram signature..About the Fragrance:I Want Choo Forever encapsulates a sense of confidence and elegance unlike any other. The I Want Choo Forever woman is fearless, seductive, a bit unexpected, passionate, and here to have fun—she evolves in a joyful environment, always with her girlfriends.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (Sd Alcohol 40-B), Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Limonene, Citronellol, Citral, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, BHT.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne
shades: 1 oz / 30 mL cologne spray, 3.4 oz / 100 mL cologne spray, 1.7 oz / 50 ml cologne spray
about: Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Aquatics.Key Notes:Ambrette Seeds, Sea Salt, Sage.Fragrance Description:A fresh, mineral, and woody scent with subtle aromatic tones. Spritz on this energizing cologne perfume to be instantly transported to windswept shores with waves breaking white, the air alive with sea salt and spray. A unique fragrance that’s at once sophisticated, lively, and totally joyful..About the Fragrance:A note of ambrette seed opens this uplifting perfume, bringing an aura of sophistication. Sea salt minerality illuminates the heart. Herbal sage defines the base with woody aromatic tones, adding a natural depth to the scent.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water, Fragrance, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral, Coumarin, Bht.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Like perfume or eau de toilette, cologne is a fragrance designed to be worn on the skin..-Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points—your body heat will help to diffuse the scent as the day goes on.  .-After applying your cologne, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.  .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace the fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.

name: English Pear & Freesia + English Pear & Sweet Pea Cologne Duo
about: Set Description:This duo includes the luscious fruity English Pear & Freesia Cologne and the new, garden-fresh, light-floral English Pear & Sweet Pea Cologne..About the Fragrance:Jo Malone London colognes are meant to be combined. This means you can layer and mix more than one fragrance to create your own unique, individual scent. Spray perfume liberally and layer with bath and body products to make the most out of your scented experience..This Set Contains:- 0.3 oz/ 9 mL English Pear & Freesia Cologne
ingredients: English Pear & Freesia Cologne:.Alcohol Denat., Water/Aqua/Eau, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol...English Pear & Sweet Pea Cologne:.Alcohol Denat., Water/Aqua/Eau, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Limonene, Citral, Eugenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points—your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. .-Wear alone or layer with another cologne or your favorite bath and body products.

ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and Vitamin E..-Avocado Oil:  Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter:  Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Citric Acid**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool.  ..*Organic..**Naturally Derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josie’s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.

name: Prebiotix™, C-Boost 72 Hydrating Whipped Cream 20% Vitamin C Niacinamide Complex
about: What it is:A lightweight moisturizer clinically shown to drench your skin with up to 72 hours of hydration and deliver a visible glow—in one use..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Dryness, and Dullness.Formulation:Lightweight Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C: Is an antioxidant that visibly brightens and evens skin tone..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This airy moisturizer provides all skin types with maximum hydration for a healthy-looking glow. shades: Out of stock: 1.7 oz/ 50 mL  , 3.3 oz/ 100 mL
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sheer..Key Notes: Cetalox (Synthetic Ambergris)..Fragrance Description: Not a Perfume is a unique fragrance crafted from a single ingredient, Cetalox. This ingredient is known for its sheer and pure scent. This perfume is hypoallergenic and perfect for those who are seeking the ultimate skin musk fragrance that is subtle yet sophisticated...About the Bottle: The bottle is an extension of the fragrance’s minimalist philosophy. Sleek, with clean lines it brings an elegant yet understated look and feel. The simplicity of the bottle is crafted with attention to detail, ensuring it feels luxurious and high-quality...About the Fragrance: Challenging the conventions of traditional perfumery by creating a fragrance with a single mollecular ingredient. ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Apply the fragrance to your pulse points where the skin is warmest, which helps to diffuse the scent throughout the day. (Wrists, Inner elbows, Base of the throat, Behind the ears).Ensure your skin is clean and moisturized before applying the fragrance. Moisturized skin helps retain the scent longer..Hold the bottle about 6 inches away from your skin and spritz lightly..Do not rub your wrists together after applying the fragrance. Rubbing can break down the scent molecules, causing the fragrance to fade more quickly..Since NOT A PERFUME is composed of a single ingredient, it layers well with other fragrances. If you wish, you can apply another scent over it to create a unique fragrance combination.

about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Badiane, Cashmere Flower, Tonka Bean.Fragrance Description:Imagined and created by Romano Ricci, great-grandson of Nina Ricci, Ode to Dullness brings poetry to the ordinary. It’s a creamy composition of badiane, cashmere flower, sandalwood, and tonka bean—an indisputably cozy scent. Behind the apparent dullness often lies the extraordinary..About the Bottle:The bottle aims to capture the beauty of the mundane. While the blue-gray gradient evokes feelings of calm and serenity, the burgundy touch brings a sense of sophistication and femininity..About the Fragrance:If dullness often has a pejorative interpretation in the west, it invites a completely different sense in Asia. Instead of being a synonym of boringness or insipidity, it displays an array of softness and poetic reflection, inviting us to slow down in the fast-paced life we live in.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Farnesol, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Perfume reacts naturally with the warmth of your body. Apply to pulse points for a bold, longer-lasting intensity..-Apply from a distance and allow the mist to gently fall on skin and work its magic..-Avoid rubbing after application. Heat from friction alters the formulation, causing it to diminish its strength..-It is best to replace your fragrance 12 months after opening in order to ensure that the original scent and intensity remains.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

about: What it is: A richly moisturizing hair mask infused with JVN’s unique triple hydration system for up to 72 hours of instant hydration after a single use...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Frizz.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage..Key Benefits:.- 72 hours of instant hydration.- Leaves hair 15x easier to comb.- Smooths frizz and split ends..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Keratris: A vegan keratin alternative that provides hydration and frizz control..- Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..- Amino Acids: Smooth hair cuticle for a silkier feel and reduce the look of split ends...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Deeply infuse moisture to transform dry hair and nourish split ends for your softest strands, thanks to a first-of-its-kind triple hydration system powered by hemisqualane, amino acids, and groundbreaking keratris—JVN’s high-performance, vegan keratin alternative, sourced from upcycled orange...Fragrance Description: An accord of amber woods and musk brings luminous warmth to a blend of balmy summer flowers, rounded by touches of crisp apple and violet leaf...Clinical Results: Based on a 21-day consumer study of 35 subjects used once per week:.- 100% said hair felt more nourished and hydrated.- 97% saw less breakage and a reduction in the appearance of split ends.Instantly hydrates & retains moisture for upto 72 hours after one use*.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Keratris: A vegan keratin alternative that provides hydration and frizz control..-Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..-Amino Acids: Smooth hair cuticle for a silkier feel and reduce the look of split ends...Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Squalane, Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Esters, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Panthenol, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Gluconate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance/Parfum, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool..*Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.

name: Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is:A leave-in treatment mask for all hair types that clinically reverses damage in four minutes. The patented peptide technology works to repair damage from bleach, color, chemical services, and heat, restoring strength, softness, smoothness, and bounce to hair..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:- Damage/Split Ends/Breakage.Key Benefits:- Restores strength, softness, smoothness, and bounce.Highlighted Ingredients:- K18Peptide™: Repairs damage from bleach, color, chemical services, and heat..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This mask is powered by the patented K18Peptide, which is just the right size and molecular structure to reach the innermost layers of hair and re-connect broken keratin chains responsible for hair's strength and elasticity..Fragrance Description:The light floral scent features notes of jasmine and peony...Clinical Results:In a clinical study on hair that was bleached 8 times, after 2 uses:
ingredients: -K18Peptide™: Repairs damage from bleach, color, chemical services, and heat...Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptide), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.In the shower:.-Shampoo, don‘t condition...Once out of the shower:.-Using a towel gently dry hair until damp..-Begin with one mL/one dime-size amount of K18 Mask..-Only add more as needed. Average use is two mL/two dime-size amounts (this is a highly concentrated formula, so you‘ll need much less than traditional masks)..-Work evenly into hair from ends to roots..-Let sit for four minutes to activate..-Don‘t rinse out..-Style as usual after the four minutes is up (fine to add heat protectant or styling product now)..-Use for the first four to six washes, then swap to maintenance mode and use as needed.

name: DAMAGE SHIELD Protective Conditioner

ingredients: -Biotech-Produced Polysaccharide: Protects and shields hair from pollution and environmental aggressors..-Fortifying Ceramide Blend: Seals damage sites, smoothing and protecting hair from future damage..-K18PEPTIDE™: Replenishes protein lost during washing to fortify hair...Water (Aqua) (Eau), Isopropyl Palmitate, Stearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Isopen1yldiol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Tocopherol, Tocopherylacerate, Sh-Oligopeptide-78,Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweer Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Phospholipids, Jojoba Esters, Calcium Gwconate, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyl­Trimonium Chloride, Ceramide Np, Phytosteryijisostearyijceiyij Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyquaternium-16, Stearalkonium Chloride, Isopropylalcohol, Bij1ylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Phenoxyerhanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.

name: PEPTIDE PREP™ Clarifying Detox Shampoo

name: THE WEDDING SILK SANTAL | 36 Eau de Parfum
shades: 1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Sparkling Champagne, White Freesia, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:The Wedding Silk Santal 36 surprises with a playful opening of sparkling champagne and silky white freesia, while pink praline and lush nectarine dominate the heart of this romantic fragrance. The sweetness of sugared musk and the creamy sandalwood perfectly round out this dazzling scent as a toast to the celebration of love..About the Bottle:KAYALI’s signature diamond-shaped bottles and opulent jeweled caps are inspired by traditional Middle Eastern oud bottles..About the Fragrance:Designed as an ode to everlasting love, Mona and Hassan created the Wedding Collection to wear on their special day. Inspired by the beautiful bond that unites these twin flames, The Wedding Silk Santal 36 and The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 are bound by the strength of creamy sandalwood. Also known as santal, this hero note grounds each scent while also glorifying the unique blend of decadent ingredients found in each bottle. Timeless when worn alone, yet amplified when layered together, these juices are made to be shared and celebrate love in all its forms.

ingredients: Sd Alcohol 40-B/Alcohol Denat., Fragrance/Parfum, Water/Aqua/Eau, Coumarin, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on your pulse points: inside of the wrists, behind the knees, the center of the chest, nape of the neck, behind the ears, and clothes for a more potent scent trail. .-For even longer wear, be sure to moisturize with balm or lotion before spritzing on the body. .-For a delicate diffusion, spray on your hair towel before drying your hair or directly onto your hairbrush before styling. ..Mona’s favorite layering combos:.The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & The Wedding Silk Santal 36 (sold separately):.For a captivating and comforting combo bound by the signature note of sandalwood...The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & Déjà Vu White Flower 57 (sold separately):.For a warm and seductive combination...The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & Yum Pistachio Gelato 33 (sold separately):.For an irresistible and tempting blend of gourmand and woody notes.

about: What it is: A new and improved luxurious formula of the iconic hair oil, now refillable, formulated with wild camellia to smooth frizz and enhance shine, while nourishing and protecting against heat up to 450°F..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.- Heat Protection.- Shine.Key Benefits:.- Leaves hair smoother and irresistibly soft.- Enhances hair shine and reduces frizz.- Strengthens and provides heat protection up to 450°F.Highlighted Ingredients:- Wild Camellia Flower: Resilient flower with high concentration of antioxidants to nourish hair..What Else You Need to Know: Achieve radiant shine with the new and improved formula of the iconic hair oil infused with wild camellia, loved and recommended by pros and consumer worldwide. This lightweight oil provides 92 percent more shine**, and up to 10x smoother* and 10x stronger* hair. This luxurious hair oil controls frizz up to 96 hours, strengthens hair, and provides heat protection up to 450°F. This multi-benefit oil can be used as an instant conditioning treatment to deeply nourish hair, a styling aid to reduce frizz, or a finishing touch to your final style for shiny and soft hair...The new iconic hair oil is now refillable. name: Angels Share Eau De Parfum
shades: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray
size: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Cognac, Tonka Bean and Oak Wood..Fragrance Description: This fragrance features cognac essence, oak absolute, cinnamon essence, and tonka bean absolute, with distinct notes of sandalwood, praline, and vanilla creating a delicious finish...About the Bottle: The bottle of this Liquors perfume can be refilled indefinitely, because as Kilian himself says, True luxury should last forever. This bottle is designed as a speakeasy essential, reminiscent an art deco glass that pays homage to the quintessential accessory in enjoying a cognac - a crystal glass. The weighted glass is engraved with the iconic K motif, catching light from every angle. It is adorned with a golden, diamond-shaped plaque signed in white serigraphy. These details infuse Kilian Paris with a sense of luxury that is timeless...About the Fragrance: This fragrance is Kilian's most personal one yet. Kilian wanted to translate his olfactive memory of his family's oak barrels drenched in eau-de-vie into this unique fragrance. He used real cognac essence in the fragrance's composition to bring these memories to life.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water\Aqua\Eau, Coumarin, Limonene, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Cinnamal, Linalool, Eugenol, Benzyl Benzoate, BHT.  ..Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Woody Spices.Key Notes:Wheat Absolute, Davana Essence, Cedarwood.Fragrance Description:Old Fashioned opens with the earthiness of wheat absolute and the slightly floral liquored aspect of davana essence. The weighted glass is engraved with the emblematic K motif to throw and catch light at all angles, finished with a golden, diamond-shaped plaque signed in white serigraphy. These details bring to KILIAN PARIS creations a guarantee of luxury, that should not be ephemeral, but should last a lifetime. As such, this perfume is endlessly refillable..About the Fragrance:Old Fashioned Eau de Parfum is the scent of an exquisite 18-year-aged single malt Scottish whiskey, a perfume portrait of refinement that only time can achieve. Wheat and Tolu Balm capture this liquor at the moment of tasting perfection.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water\Aqua\Eau, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Benzyl Cinnamate, Limonene, Cinnamal, Linalool, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Benzoic Acid, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Red 4 (Ci 14700), Blue 1 (Ci 42090).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Metal Detox Sulfate-Free Shampoo
about: What it is: A sulfate-free shampoo formulated with exclusive technology that gently removes harmful metal particles found in water to protect hair color and improve overall hair health..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:.- Shine.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Color Fading.Key Benefits:.- Gently cleanses to remove metal particles found in water.- Prevents hair damage and breakage caused by metals to improve hair health.- Helps maintain color vibrancy and adds shine.Highlighted Ingredients:.- Glicoamine: Patented technology that penetrates inside the hair fiber to detoxify metal particles found in water..Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS & SLES..What Else You Need to Know: As water flows through eroded pipes, harsh metals accumulate in hair over time. Excess metal build up reduces overall hair health, leading to hair damage, breakage, and color fading. This sulfate-free shampoo gently removes unwanted metal particles trapped inside the hair fiber. Its exclusive formula can be used on color-treated hair to help protect against metal-induced color fading, or on virgin hair to reduce breakage and restore hair health. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.How to Apply: .- Step 1: Shade match! Shade numbers have changed with this reformulation. Take a look at the conversion chart to easily find your new shade! .- Step 2: Prep your skin with Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum for added hydration. .- Step 3: For long-wear and a smoother canvas, apply oil-free La Base Pro Perfecting and Smoothing Makeup Primer. .-Step 4: Apply the foundation with your favorite tool. Apply with a foundation brush for maximum coverage and a flawless result. Apply with a damp sponge for medium-to-full coverage and a dewy makeup look. Apply with fingers for the lightest application and a no makeup makeup look .....Pro tip:.For a radiant foundation finish, mix a drop of Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum or your favorite moisturizer with your foundation before applying. .....Diving Deeper Into Foundation Color Match:.Find your undertone.-Cool: Bare skin usually burns easily in the sun. Veins appear blue. .-Neutral: Bare skin has combination of both cool and warm undertones. Veins appear a mix of green and blue. .-Warm: Bare skin appears golden/yellow and tans easily in the sun. Olive skin can sometimes skew warm as well for those with a slightly more gold hue. Veins appear green.

name: Translucent Loose Setting Powder
shades: Translucent perfect for very fair to medium skintones, Honey medium skin tones with olive, warm and golden undertones, Translucent Medium Deep perfect for medium deep to the deepest skintones
about: What it is: A lightweight, easy-to-apply, loose powder that blends effortlessly to set makeup for up to 16 hours of wear and 24 hour shine control..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Vitamin C + E Powders: powerful antioxidants known to support a more even toned complexion overtime.-Botanical Blurring Powder: silky, fine-milled plant derived powder blurs the looks of pores and absorbs excess oil.-Skin Conditioning Powder: natural amino acid powder that melts into skin for an undetectable finish.What Else You Need to Know: This award-winning powder locks in makeup for long-lasting wear without adding weight or texture. It absorbs oil and reduces shine all day, creating a flawless, matte finish with no flashback in photos. These truly-translucent shades work on all skin tones, and create a soft-focus effect to subtly blur fine lines and imperfections..Translucent is perfect for fair to medium and tan skin tones..Translucent Honey is perfect for medium skin tones with olive and golden undertones..Translucent Medium Deep is perfect for medium-deep to deep skin tones...Clinical Results: TLSP was shown to have:.- No flashback in photos.- 16-hour long-wear.- 24 hours of shine control.In a consumer test on 32 women after 2 weeks:.- 100% said it is lightweight and does not look cakey on skin.- 100% said it controls and reduces shine.- 97% said it absorbs excess oil
ingredients: TALC, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, NYLON-12, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, ZEA MAYS (CORN) STARCH, METHICONE, LAUROYL LYSINE, POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, TOCOPHEROL, METHYLPARABEN, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, PROPYLPARABEN, BUTYLPARABEN. MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/(+/-): IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), YELLOW 5 LAKE (CI 19140), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep Laura Mercier’s Velour Puff (sold separately) by massaging Translucent Loose Setting Powder into the puff, folding both halves together .-Tap the powdered side on the back of your hand to remove excess..-Fold the puff in half and gently press and roll the puff onto skin to set your makeup. Around the eyes, use Laura Mercier’s Secret Brightening Powder for Under Eyes (sold separately). .-Focus on the areas where makeup breaks down the most..-Apply after any creamy formulas, including cream blush..-Tip: Renowned Makeup Artist Laura Mercier uses it to set foundation and prolong its wear. She applies it after foundation and concealer, and before applying powder-based color. As an added benefit, it eases the application of powder blush or bronzer.

name: Lilly Lashes 3D Faux Mink Lashes
shades: Milan wispy, flared lash with criss-cross pattern, Miami round lash style, complimentary to all eye shapes, Mykonos round lash style,  most complimentary to upturned and almond eye shapes, Rome round lash style, most complimentary to almond, upturned & round eye shapes

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Step 1: Carefully remove the lashes from the tray sweeping under the lash and using a lash applicator to lightly grip lash band. Gently lift the band away from the tray, never pulling on the lashes. ...Step 2: Hold the lash up to your eye to measure for sizing. If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, use lash scissors to trim the lash accordingly. Conservatively trim from the inner or outer corner. ...Step 3: Once your desired length is established, use a lash applicator to gently hold lash and apply a thin layer of lash adhesive on the lash band (allow it to dry for 30 seconds). ...Step 4: Once the lash adhesive is tacky, use the lash applicator to carefully place the lash evenly to the middle of the eye lid, as close as possible to the lash line. Once comfortably applied to lash line, use lash applicator to ensure lash is firmly attached to both inner and outer part of the eye.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Carefully remove lashes from the tray, sweeping under the lash and using a lash applicator to lightly grip lash band. If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, trim the lash accordingly. .-Once your desired length is established, apply a thin layer of lash adhesive on the lash band and allow it to dry for 30 seconds..-Once the lash adhesive is tacky, carefully place the lash as close as possible to the lash line. .-Once comfortably applied to the lash line, finish with using a lash curler to help fuse your natural and false lash together.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Curl your lashes and apply mascara before applying your false lashes..-Carefully remove the lashes from the tray..-Pull from the band of one end of the lash, never pulling on the lashes themselves..-Hold the lash up to your eye to measure for sizing..-If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, trim the lash accordingly, cutting it from the inner or outer corner..-Place a thin layer of non-permanent glue on the band of the lash..-Allow it to dry for 30 seconds..-Place the lash on top of your natural lash line..-Allow lashes to dry in place.

name: Full Dry Volume and Texture Spray
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A versatile spray that turns up the volume or texture on different styles for an imperfectly perfect, lived-in look and feel..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, and Curly.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Heat Protection.Key Benefits:- Instant, revivable, and long-lasting volume and texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This finishing styler is scientifically engineered to dial up any look and give hair immediate and long-lasting volume, texture, and soft hold in just a few sprays. It is formulated with Living Proof's patented Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule, which is lighter than industry-standard ingredients and increases the space between individual hair fibers for long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair. The spray instantly transforms fine, flat, or thin hair while adding major volume, coveted texture, and buildable hold with a lived-in look and feel.
ingredients: -Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule: Delivers long-lasting volume and texture that won’t weigh down hair. .-Blend of Microporous Minerals and Enzymatically Modified Starches: Gives hair lived-in texture and lightly absorbs oil..-Hydrophobic Resins: Provide an instant, buildable, and soft hold that lasts—even in high humidity...Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclodextrin, Zeolite, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before each spray, shake can well. .-Hold can six to 10 inches away from dry hair. .-Lift a section of hair and apply root to tip. .-Tousle hair with your fingers. .-Repeat until desired style is achieved, shake can between each spray. .-Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold. .-Tips and tricks: Tip head sideways or upside down and spray product in small bursts throughout lengths for more texture... Recycling Instructions:.-This product is recyclable through TerraCycle.

name: Moondance Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Velvet Rose, Magnolia, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: This richly warm-floral fragrance exudes elegance with an edge, like a night filled with sophistication and an air of mystery. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohen’s lifelong love of ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The ivory and pink Ribbon Rosa Flora print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the bottle itself, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase...About the Fragrance: A heart that’s as big as it is wild. Last to leave the dance floor. name: Bohème Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Classic Florals..Key Notes: Blackcurrant, Peony, White Amber..Fragrance Description: This classic and clean, skin-loving floral is a charming and innately cool bouquet with an abundance of peonies and a blush of blackcurrant. The notes of spherical blooms are joined by touches of white flowers including tuberose, rose, and jasmine, while soft white amber and sandalwood offer a smooth and soft finish...About the Bottle: An oversized bow, perfectly imperfect. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohen’s lifelong love of ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The sky blue and white Ever-Blooming Rosette print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the bottle itself, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase...About the Fragrance: Naturally cool with an undeniable charm. Bohème is a spirited floral that captures a peony in full bloom, laced with blackcurrant and soft white amber. A forever romantic, endlessly in pursuit of wanderlust. Created with love and an intriguing, light warmth by perfumer Yves Cassar....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The spirit of LoveShackFancy is apparent upon first—and second and third—whiff..-Apply on pulse points to wrists, neck, and behind the ears..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin..-This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.

about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose, Vanilla Flower..Fragrance Description:No.14 Icila, a warm floral fragrance opens with top notes of ruby pamplemousse, Mandarin leaf, and jasmine. At its heart are dark plum, vanilla, and Sakura blossoms. A base of warm, sultry woods and sweet floral blossoms leave a shimmering effect, reminding you there is no better moment than now..About the Fragrance:Inspired by the French word ici, meaning here, this intoxicating scent demonstrates that every fleeting second is sacred. Icila reminds us of the gift of time that should never be taken for granted..Clean & Planet Aware:Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Geraniol, Coumarin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Citronellol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: 'REPLICA' Afternoon Delight Eau de Toilette with Vanilla & Sandalwood
shades: 1 oz / 30 ml eau de toilette spray, 3.4 oz / 100 ml eau de toilette spray
size: 3.4 oz / 100 ml eau de toilette spray
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Madagascar Vanilla, Madeleine Accord, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Afternoon Delight is a gourmand, sweet perfume that captures the memory of delectable self-indulgences. The madeleine accord blends with the woody notes of sandalwood, whipped vanilla, and musk to create a rich and creamy unisex fragrance that will evoke your sweetest memories...About the Bottle: Influenced by the look of classic apothecary jars, the luxe perfume bottle carries a cotton label with black ink text and a unique pump wrapped with rope as an homage to the original couture line. The warm fragrance within is echoed by the Polaroid photograph of a madeleine enjoyed outside a Parisian café printed on the outside carton...*The natural vanilla used in this fragrance has evolution that can affect colors. Potential color change has no impact on the quality of the scent...About the Fragrance: The signature ingredient in this vanilla perfume, the madeleine accord, transports you to a Parisian café, where the uplifting aroma of warm pastries and sugar fills the air. A moment to treat oneself and allow all cares to slip away.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For foundation:.-Find and mix shades that most closely match your skin tone..-Apply using your fingertips, a sponge, or a brush....To contour:.-Start by selecting a sculpting shade one or two tones deeper than your skin..-Apply to desired areas, like your cheekbones and jawline, to create depth and dimension..-Blend in an upward motion for the most natural look....To highlight:.-Apply highlighter on areas you want to illuminate, such as upper cheekbones, bridge of nose, chin, or Cupid's bow....For blush:.-Select a blush shade of your choice or mix shades to create your ideal color..-Apply to apples of cheeks, blending upwards for a lifting effect....Pro tip:.-Use the skin-tone shades to adjust your favorite foundation if your complexion changes throughout the year.

name: Artist Color Pencil Longwear Lip Liner
shades: Out of stock: 506 Endless Cacao Cool Taupe Brown, 600 Anywhere Caffeine Warm Caramel Nude, 602 Completely Sepia Soft Nude Pink, Out of stock: 604 Up & Down Tan Medium Warm Nude, Out of stock: 606 Wherever Walnut Warm Rose Nude, Out of stock: 608 Limitless Brown Rich Chocolate Brown , 610 Versatile Chestnut Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes), 612 Dimensional Dark Brown Deep Neutral Brown, Out of stock: 708 Universal Earth Warm Brick Brown, Out of stock: 714 Full Red True Red, Out of stock: 808 Boundless Berry Medium Berry (Not suitable for use on eyes)
about: What it is: A long-wear lip liner that applies effortlessly to shape and enhance lips with a richly pigmented and creamy formula..Formulation Type: Lip Liner..Benefits: Long wearing..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The comfortable matte texture is easy to blend and feels weightless on lips. The precise, wooden pencil guarantees sharp lines and a smooth, long-lasting application with no feathering. You can use this lip liner as your perfect nude alone or pair with your favorite gloss or lipstick.
ingredients: Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearyl Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Octadecene, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Kaolin, Synthetic Wax, Polyethylene, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)]...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a MAKE UP FOR EVER product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging to ensure that the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trace the Cupid's bow of the lip, ensuring the highpoints are balanced..-Define the center of the bottom lip in parallel with the bow of the lip..-Outline corners of the lips, then trace along the natural lip line to connect all lines..-Sharpen as needed for clean and precise lines....Pro Tip:.-To create volume, connect the outer corners to the centers of the lips..-To reduce volume, connect from the center of the lips to the outer corners.

name: Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner
shades: 506 Endless Cacao cool taupe brown, 600 Anywhere Caffeine warm caramel nude, 606 Wherever Walnut warm rose nude, 608 Limitless Brown rich chocolate brown, 612 Dimensional Dark Brown deep neutral brown
about: What it is:An intensely pigmented, waterproof lip liner that glides on lips for all-day, no-budge color..Benefits:Long-wearing.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This waterproof, transfer-proof pencil is ideal for definition that won't feather or fade. The ultra-creamy texture glides with ease and wears comfortably all day, has a velvet-matte finish, and can be worn alone or with your favorite lipstick or gloss.
ingredients: Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Polybutene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Isoamyl Laurate, Silica, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Cetearyl Behenate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Barium Sulfate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci.15850 (Red 7)]...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a MAKE UP FOR EVER product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging to ensure that the ingredients.are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trace the Cupid’s bow, ensuring the highpoints are balanced. .-Define the center of the bottom lip in parallel with the bow of the lip. .-Outline the corners of the lips, then trace along the natural lip line to connect all lines. .-Sharpen as needed for clean and precise lines. .-Pro Tip: To create volume and give the illusion of fuller lips, start tracing your lips from your outer corners to the center of your lips.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:. To conceal a blemish: .-Either under or over foundation, use the silicone tip of Brush 178 (sold separately) and  tap the correcting shade that addresses redness on any blemishes. .-Using the brush side of Brush 178 (sold separately), mix the concealer shades to customize and apply by tapping over top of the corrector and slightly beyond. .-Set with Super Matte Loose Powder or finish with Ultra HD Powder (both powders sold separately)...To brighten the eye area: .-Either under or over foundation, use the silicone tip of Brush 178 (sold separately) and apply the color correcting shades that address blue/purple discoloration. .-Apply only over those areas around the eye that need correction. .-Using the brush side of Brush 178 (sold separately), mix the concealer shades to customize and apply by tapping over top and diffusing slightly beyond where the corrector shade was applied. .-Set with Super Matte Loose Powder or finish with Ultra HD Powder (both powders sold separately).

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep skin with your favorite skincare or preferred primer. .-Apply two pumps directly onto the center of your brush or back of the hand. .-Starting at the center of the face, apply in a downward motion toward the jawline and buff into the skin for an even application. .-For extra coverage, dampen your HD Skin Foundation Sponge (sold separately) with water or a hydrating setting spray, lightly tapping the foundation onto the face until desired level of coverage has been achieved. ..Pro Tip: .-Mix in a few drops of your favorite hydrating primer or face oil for a luminous, sheer-tint finish.  .-Spray Mist & Fix (sold separately) onto prepped skin and your favorite sponge as a priming spray and press into the skin prior to applying foundation for extra hydration and even longer wear.

name: Lover Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Luscious Fig, Flirtatious Jasmine Sambac, Arousing Oud.Fragrance Description:The Maker’s Lover Eau de Parfum is a hypnotic, woody scent that evokes a warm embrace. Creamy sandalwood, luscious fig, and sparkling vetiver blanket the skin while layered notes of jasmine sambac, narcissus, and a whisper of oud slowly reveal themselves like desires between lovers..About the Bottle:Inspired by an antique ink flask, the bottle is sensuous, smooth, and comfortable to hold with fluted glass panels. Ribbed glass is a signature look seen throughout The Maker Hotel, from fragrance and candles to glassware and lighting fixtures. Made with post-consumer-recycled glass, The Maker uses 27 percent less glass than traditional perfume bottles and C02-free production methods..About the Fragrance:Both grounding and magnetic, this gender-inclusive fragrance was inspired by the unrelenting bond between two lovers.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Eau), Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray the fragrance on your wrists, shoulders, or neck to create a personal fragrance aura. .-When pairing multiple scents, apply them to different areas of your body and let the fragrances gradually come together..-Do not press your wrists together after application or spray two fragrances on the same spot. It will destroy the composition. ..Recycling Instructions:.Each part of The Maker perfume bottles can be recycled within your home recycling bin by following these steps: .-Remove the cap, made of Zamak, and recycle with aluminum metals..-Unscrew the spray pump, pull out the plastic tube, and recycle with plastics..-Recycle the pump with aluminum metals. .-Recycle the glass bottle with glass. .-All of The Maker boxes are made with FSC-certified board and can be recycled with paper.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on pulse points: behind the ears and on your wrists... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Gua Sha Facial Lifting Tool
shades: Jade, Rose Quartz, Amethyst, Black Obsidian
about: What it is:.Solutions for:.If you want to know more….What else you need to know:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start with a clean face and prep skin with a facial oil or serum...-Keep the tool flat against the face and begin with the forehead. Scrape in an upwards motion from the eyebrows to the hairline...-Move to the cheeks and scrape in an outwards motion starting from the crease of the nose until the ear...-Move to the jawline and use the end of the Gua Sha tool with the two curves. Start from the chin and scrape until the ear. Gently massage the Gua Sha tool into the ear to release tension...-For the under-eye area, very gently scrape the Gua Sha from the inner corner of the eye outwards to the temple. Because the area is so sensitive, it is important to only apply light pressure.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start in the middle of the face and roll outward across the cheeks..-Move to the eyebrows and roll upward across the forehead..-Move below the lower lip and roll downward across the chin..-Use the smaller end for more delicate areas and harder-to-reach places..-Use the larger end for broad surfaces.

name: Alien Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Warm Floral.Key Notes:Jasmine Sambac, Cashmeran Wood, Amber Gris.Fragrance Description:The woody-floral fragrance borders the realms of spirituality and sensuality with a blend of soft lavender atop a base of cashmeran wood and white amber, exuding a positive energy with each mist of the sensual women's scent..About the Bottle:The refillable amethyst-inspired bottle symbolizes femininity and refinement. Accented by metallic gold, the warm floral women's perfume is encapsulated within..About the Fragrance:Thierry Mugler envisioned Alien as a sensation—the moment that occurs before a miracle. There is silence, fullness, and an expectancy of the supernatural. The bold floral perfume is named Alien because inside every woman is something so unique, so special, it is Alien to everything around her.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent.... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:.The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

name: Cellular Hydration Repair Serum
about: What it is:A concentrated serum with Hexapeptide-9 that visibly restores the skin barrier at the cellular level​ in just 30 minutes..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Redness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Biomimetic Hexapeptide-9: Restores damaged skin by emulating barrier-enforcing peptides that reduce water loss​..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Meet the modern serum with active ingredients, based on Dr. Murad’s principle of Cellular Hydration. This principle shows that damaged cells need to be repaired, since the ability of healthy cells to hold water and nutrients is the fundamental marker of true skin wellness.
ingredients: -Biomimetic Hexapeptide-9: Restores damaged skin by emulating barrier-enforcing peptides that reduce water loss​..-Refined Bilberry Seed Oil: Provides the essential fatty acids for healthy barriers: omegas 3 and 6..-Network of Hyaluronic Acid Molecules: Forms a protective layer that continuously delivers water to skin...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Vaccinium Myrtillus Seed Oil, C14-22 Alcohols, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Lactobacillus Ferment, Salix Alba (Willow) Extract, Zanthoxylum Bungeanum Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hexapeptide-9, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopherol, Oleyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pullulan, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Sclerotium Gum, Lysolecithin, Xanthan Gum, Silica, Glucose, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Limonene, Linalool, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use AM and PM..-Apply an even layer of Cellular Hydration Repair Serum onto clean skin. .-Massage Cellular Hydration Repair Cream (sold separately) evenly over face and neck. .-Follow with a sunscreen during the day..-On nights when skin needs added soothing and hydration, massage Cellular Hydration Repair Mask (sold separately) over Cellular Hydration Repair Serum in place of your cream. Do not rinse until morning.

ingredients: wf
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Start application where the strongest color impact is desired; the strongest color payoff will be at the first point of brush contact to skin..- For a natural rush of color, gently buff color onto skin using sweeping circular motions with NARS #16 Blush Brush for more color payoff, or NARS Yachiyo Brush for softer color payoff (brushes sold separately)..- For a seamless pop of color, layer two shades of Blush. Start with a base color in a shade that gives a subtle color to the cheeks. Layer a brighter shade in a similar tone on the apples of the cheek, then blend edges to diffuse into base color. .- For a touch-up or additional coverage, use a stippling motion when applying Blush to press color onto skin without disrupting coverage already created..- Can't get enough? Save your NARS Talc-Free Powder Blush compact, full-size refills are available in select shades....Refill Product Instructions:..Blush pan refills are available in select shades..1. Find the hole on the bottom of the compact.2. Use a safety pin or small object to pop out the current pan of NARS Blush.3. New, magnetic pan will snap into place

name: Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil Rollerball
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Madagascar Vanilla Bean, Vanilla Orchid, Coconut.Fragrance Description:Capture the allure of Madagascar's landscape with this nourishing perfume oil featuring the warm essence of vanilla bean, the subtle floralcy of vanilla orchid, and a hint of coconut. It’s artfully blended with baobab oil for a formula that melts into your skin while leaving behind a long-lasting fragrance..About the Bottle:Housed in a jewel-like glass bottle tinted with a warm amber hue and featuring a dropper that offers a completely unique and customizable fragrance experience..About the Fragrance:This gourmand perfume oil features Madagascar vanilla, one of the most expensive crops in the world, in part because of the elaborate care it needs all season long. The vanilla orchid must be hand-pollinated by skilled harvesters, who then spend a year curing and drying each pod to perfection, giving dozens of local villages a source of livelihood.
ingredients: Fragrance (Parfum), Dipropylene Glycol, Triethyl Citrate, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin, Propanediol, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil (Baobab Oil), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide over your arms, legs, décolleté—anywhere on your body that you want to indulge with nourishment and a highly concentrated expression of exquisite fragrance. .-Ensure oil is fully absorbed prior to delicate fabrics coming in contact with skin.
